title: AEREX AVIONICS

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $6.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with AEREX AVIONICS. The average
  contract duration was 3.76 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.4M.
  The longest contract was 5.03 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $11.5M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '6.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '26'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '12%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '9%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '6.5K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '3.76'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '2.4M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '5.03'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '11.5M'
